original: Österblom, Carl Eskil, civilingenjör, Motala Verkstad, f. 2/5/97 i Berghem, Älvsb. 1., av Carl Fredrik Ö. o. Maria Dorothea Andréen. G. 35 m. Sonja Lindvall. Barn: Sonja Maria f. 39, Carl Fredrik 45, d. 47. — Avg:ex. fr. CTI (M) 21. Anst. v. Borås Väfveri A-B i Kungsfors, Skene, 23, v. The Shipley Construction & Supply Co. i Brooklyn, N. Y., USA, 23-24, v. The Babcock & Wilcox Co., Bayonne, N. J., USA, 24-25, v. The State High-way Commission o. N. J. 25-27, 30-32, v. The Port of New York Authoritv, N. Y., 27-28, v. Voorhees, Gmelin & Walker, architects, N. Y., 28-30, v. The Halifax Harbour Comm. i Halifax 30, platsled. v. stat. arb :lösh :komm. 33-35, v. ing. Paul Andersons byggn :byrå i Västeråsi 36-36, v. ASEAs mek. avd. i Västerås 36-43, v. Motala Verkst. fr. 43. Led. av Sv. tekn: för en. 3’5.
translated: Österblom, Carl Eskil, civil engineer, Motala Verkstad, b. 2/5/97 in Berghem, Älvsb. 1., son of Carl Fredrik Ö. and Maria Dorothea Andréen. Married in 1935 to Sonja Lindvall. Children: Sonja Maria b. 1939, Carl Fredrik b. 1945, d. 1947. — Graduated from CTI (M) in 1921. Employed at Borås Väfveri A-B in Kungsfors, Skene, 1923, at The Shipley Construction & Supply Co. in Brooklyn, N. Y., USA, 1923-1924, at The Babcock & Wilcox Co., Bayonne, N. J., USA, 1924-1925, at The State Highway Commission of N. J. 1925-1927, 1930-1932, at The Port of New York Authority, N. Y., 1927-1928, at Voorhees, Gmelin & Walker, architects, N. Y., 1928-1930, at The Halifax Harbour Commission in Halifax 1930, site manager at the state unemployment commission 1933-1935, at engineer Paul Anderson's building bureau in Västerås 1936-1936, at ASEA's mechanical department in Västerås 1936-1943, at Motala Verkstad since 1943. Member of the Swedish technical association since 1935.
